articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: Some Kaspersky customers receive surprise forced-update to new antivirus software - TechCrunch
articles.description: After U.S. ban, Kaspersky's American customers were automatically migrated to UltraAV antivirus, in some cases without the customers' knowledge.
articles.content: Customers of Kaspersky antivirus in the United States found out in the last few days that their cybersecurity software was automatically replaced with a new one called UltraAV, according to several c… [+3388 chars]

articles.title: Biden administration seeks to ban Chinese, Russian tech in US autonomous vehicles - The Associated Press
